title: Good Omens - Episode 6 - "The Very Last Day of the Rest of Their Lives" - Reaction
author: My Name Is Simon
comment: Sorry this one took so long to get out but here it is, the finale of Good Omens!

I really love the ending with Crowley and Aziraphale leaving the Garden, finally free, mirroring the Beginning with Adam and Eve leaving the Garden of Eden! That two choose free will from the divine plan like the first two humans! (And God actually said in the first episode "everything started, as it will end, in a Garden" - so - !)
not to be dramatic but I would die for your cat. Also his little purrs during the reaction was the cutest thing ever.
this is great and all but... does your cat know that i love him...

The whole deal with “Satan” is that it’s a name for the Leader of Hell, some texts say that the leader is the first fallen angel aka Lucifer others just state it as Satan (or the Devil) and sometimes Beelzebub (Lord of the flies) is put in the leader position... there’s a lot of discrepancies with names in religious texts.
description:
Let me know what you thought of the reaction in the comments!
